review: Bought a Chromecast a few months ago. Cool concept, but if u are an Amazon Prime member, the Fire Stick is the way to go. Even if you're not a Prime member, it's done right. U can't run Google play on it, but just like the Chromecast, u can mirror from another device, in my case, my Galaxy S5 can cast anything from my phone to the TV through Fire Stick. Love it
